text: So the organizers of this say that I need to incentivize it
Notice how I kind of held that off til the very end
And so what I'm thinking is that it's 20 minutes of your time, right?
And I'm thinking about this on the fly just so you know
I'm thinking like a point of credit
If you actually do it one point towards your grade
No don't even negotiate with me
Alright, we'll let you know what the incentive is
I'll probably send you another email to remind you how to do this and I'll let you know what the incentive is other than the good will of the community, come on
Alright, so class transcribe is one announcement
[nothing]
The other announcement is that the honors class is going to start October 20th.
[nothing]
And if you have not yet registered for it and you think you would like to do so we'll help you do the late add form
You'll have to contact us to actually post to Piazza asking for instructions on how to do that
And that's all I have for announcements
I want to remind you where we were last time
We had basically gone through this code and we had become fluent users of iterators
yes?
And we had talked a little bit about how they might be implemented
We didn't implement our own but we reasoned about how they might be implemented
So that in case anyone ever asked you to do so you know kind of where to start with the process
I have some code for you to look at today that sort of starts right here
It comes after this, and employs some of the concepts that you've used but it's probably different than anything you've seen before
So I have this function you see up here. It's a templated function and what I want you to do is write a short description of this function

Now when I say write a short description it means I want to know its name, its inputs and outputs, this one has no return type anyway, and then a very short one sentence description of what the function does
It's almost like you're writing the comments for this function
So take a couple minutes, untangle the template, and see if you can figure out what it does
Once you write that sentence I want you to describe to yourself what printer is
You might want to write it down as well
Would anybody like to come write their response on my tablet up here?
It's not wireless today
You want to come? Would you if I incentivized it?
Anybody want my pen? You can't have my tablet but you can have my pen? Anybody want it? No way? What if I threw it?
Do you want it? You're looking at me. Okay, did you want it? Thank you
Major brownie points
No in fact it would be helpful if you put some errors in there
like misspellings, you know, things like that
The rest of you can do it though, because you mostly have pencils I think
